mapper.select: SELECT BNO, BTITLE, BWRITER, BPASS, BCONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(BREGDATE, "%Y-%m-%d %T")AS BREGDATE FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BTITLE, BPASS, BWRITER, BCONTENT, BREGDATE) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bpass}, #{bwriter}, #{bcontent}, NOW())
INSERT INTO BOARDFILE(BNO, FNAME, RNAME, FSIZE, ISNEW) VALUES (#{bno}, #{fname}, #{rname}, #{fsize}, #{isnew})
mapper.select: SELECT FNO, BNO, FNAME, RNAME, FSIZE FROM BOARDFILE WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BTITLE = #{btitle}, BPASS = #{bpass}, BWRITER = #{bwriter}, BCONTENT = #{bcontent}, BREGDATE = NOW() WHERE BNO = #{bno}
